name: Playrix Entertainment
overview:
Playrix is a strong team of more than 100 inspired professionals, dedicated to creating multi-platform video games of the highest quality. Since the very beginning we’ve been striving to accomplish our mission - to bring fun to millions of our players worldwide by creating unique games. That is why we build great games and great games only.

We are focused on games for mobile devices (namely, iPhone/iPod touch, iPad and Android) and downloadable games for PC and Mac.

Nevertheless, we want to see our games on as many platforms as possible, so we can deliver the unique Playrix experience to the widest audience. We’re always open to new distribution opportunities for our games across all media, including online, box retail, as well as mobile, handheld and console platforms.

Facts and Numbers:

  • Playrix is a 100% self-funded company;
  • Our iPhone and iPad games have been downloaded over 25 million times, and regularly appear on Top-10 Games charts;
  • Playrix games are available at retail in over 50 countries and have been localized into a dozen languages;
  • Our franchise, Fishdom, has over 4 million units sold via multiple platforms and 1 million people play it daily on dozens of social networks worldwide;
  • With games released on a variety of platforms including PC, Mac, iPhone, iPad, Android, Nintendo DS, Sony PSP, mobile and social networks worldwide, Playrix continues to deliver a unique gaming experience to the widest possible audience;
